text: (Ivvāṟu avarkaḷ cattiyam ceytu kūṟiyatilum) avarkaḷ poyyē kūṟiṉārkaḷ eṉṟu niccayamāka teriyavantāl (intap poy cāṭciyattiṉāl) evarukku naṣṭamēṟpaṭṭatō avar cārpil vēṟu iruvar, (muṉpu cattiyam ceyta) avarkaḷuṭaiya iṭattil niṉṟu, ‘‘avarkaḷuṭaiya cāṭciyattai viṭa eṅkaḷ cāṭciyamtāṉ uṇmaiyāṉatu (eṉa uṟuti kūṟukiṟōm), nāṅkaḷ tavaṟāka ētum kūṟavillai. Avvāṟu kūṟiṉāl niccayamāka nāṅkaḷ aniyāyakkārarkaḷāki viṭuvōm'' eṉṟu avviruvarum allāhviṉ mītu cattiyam ceytu kūṟavēṇṭum
